title: Streamers
summaries: Streamers are placeable items that can be climbed on for mobility.

Despite their unique appearance, Streamers are functionally the same as Rope. Their ascent speed is 41 mph, the descent speed is 51 mph, and the horizontal speed is 5 mph (although it is listed as 0 mph in the game, it is 7.55 feet per second), though they cannot be crafted into Rope Coils like other Rope variants can. When multiple Streamers of the same color are hung in a single horizontal row, they will appear as a banner-style ribbon. During a Party, Streamers can be bought from the Party Girl at a price of 50 each.

statistics.Buy: 50
statistics.Sell: 10
